duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate and propose application solutions considering firm-wide needs and impact.
Define applications solutions based on user/client needs, cost, and required integrations.
Assimilate information from disparate sources, perform analysis, and implement solutions based on data across multiple departments.
Establish and document technology integration and migration strategies for the firm.
Work with consultants and internal teams to execute strategic decisions, integrations, and upgrades for applications.
Work with vendors to escalate and resolve critical applications issues.
Assume the role of IT project leader on small to medium size initiatives.
Provide guidance, support, and mentorship to other team members.
Prioritize work/projects and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.
Participate in the development and review of technical designs within their expertise.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s in Information Technology or relevant field; Or high school diploma with four years IT experience with hardware and business applications.
Minimum 12+ years of IT experience focused on software application analysis or support.
Minimum 8+ years working at an AmLaw 200 firm or other professional services partnership is preferred.
Hands-on experience with Aderant Expert, Aderant Elite, Relativity, e-Discovery, Intapp Open, Intapp Walls, iManage DeskSite, iManager FileSite, iManage Work.
Expert understanding of typical software and systems design principles.
Proficiency with MS SQL Server and the T-SQL language.
